alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 2:39AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 330 AM EST/230 AM CST/... At 239 AM EST/139 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Tyndall Air Force Base to 13 miles southwest of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Beacon Beach, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Overstreet, Milltown, Davis Beach and Kinard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
